subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, recovering from a concussion, will not attend the All-Star Game on Sunday in Raleigh, N.C., the Pittsburgh Penguins announced on their Web site Monday.
snippet: Sidney Crosby, recovering from a concussion, will not attend the All-Star Game on Sunday in Raleigh, N.C., the Pittsburgh Penguins announced on their Web site Monday.
